title: Albumazar A comedy presented before the Kings Maiestie at Cambridge, the ninth of March. 1614. By the Gentlemen of Trinitie Colledge.
author: Tomkis, Thomas, fl. 1604-1615.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes for Walter Burre, and are to be sold at his shop, in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: An adaptation of: Porta, Giambattista della. L'astrologo.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
